trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonToggleButtonAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
The element associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: Элемент, связанный с данным одноранговым элементом автоматизации.

trans-unit.source: Gets the accelerator key combinations for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToggleButton"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonToggleButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Возвращает сочетаний клавиш, предназначенные для <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToggleButton"> </xref> , связанного с данным <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonToggleButtonAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The accelerator key combinations for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToggleButton"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonToggleButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Сочетания клавиш для <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToggleButton"> </xref> , связанного с данным <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonToggleButtonAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the class name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToggleButton"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonToggleButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Возвращает имя класса <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToggleButton"> </xref> , связанного с данным <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonToggleButtonAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The class name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToggleButton"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonToggleButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.

Gets the text that describes the functionality of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToggleButton"></xref> control that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonToggleButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.

trans-unit.target: Возвращает имя, которое описывает элемент, связанный с этим <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonToggleButtonAutomationPeer"> </xref>.
